synthesis.title: Synthesis
synthesis.text: Synthetic assets meet our diverse needs. For users with hedging needs, compared with the U.S. dollar, they need stable coins (USDT, dUSD, xUSD, etc., belonging to synthetic assets) on the blockchain to facilitate the flow of funds

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.text: Trade your synthetic assets and xUSD.

liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.text: Liquidity measures how easy it is to convert assets into cash quickly and without loss. The easier the conversion, the better the liquidity of the asset. In the world of cryptocurrency trading, one of the promoters of liquidity is the deposit of many different limit orders

destroy.title: Destroy
destroy.text: Destroy xUSD to unlock your pledged DOWS. This will increase your mortgage rate and reduce your debt, allowing you to transfer DOWS not in custody

reward.title: Reward
reward.text: Mortgage DOWS to cast synthetic assets, trade synthetic assets, and get rewards every week
reward.bottomText: If you donâ€™t receive it for 7 days, the reward will be recycled to the pool. If the mortgage rate is insufficient, you will not be able to get the reward.
